placeholder.no_solved: Ouch! This team has not solved any challenges...

team.label: Select your team
team.description: Please select a team you want to participate with in this game. This cannot be changed after participation request approval.

join.title: Registration Information
content: Are you sure you want to register for this game?

After successfully registering for the competition and passing the review, the team will be locked and you will no longer be able to change your team member, e.g. invites new member or remove member from the team. The team will be unlocked after the match ends or when the participation request is denied.
The limit on the number of players refers to the number of members that have decided to participate as part of the specific team, regardless of which team you choose to play with.

invite_code.label: Please enter the invitation code
invite_code.description: This game is invitation-only. To participate in, please enter an invitation code.

organization.label: Select Division
organization.description: This game has multiple division available. Please select your division.

writeup.title: Writeup Management

instructions.title: Submission Instructions
instructions.deadline: Please submit the writeup before <1>{{datetime}}</1>, overdue or non-submissions will be considered as giving up the results of this game.
instructions.file_format: Please organize the writeup of all solved challenges into <1>a standard PDF document less than 20MB</1>.

writeup.unsubmitted_note: Your team has not submitted yet

content: Are you sure you want to quit this game?
If the number of team members is zero after you quit, the team's participation data will be deleted.

no_cheat.title: No cheating detected yet
no_cheat.comment: It looks like everyone played fair!

all_solved.title: All challenges were solved!
all_solved.comment: Perhaps more difficult challenges are waiting for you...

no_traffic.title: No challenge has traffic capture enabled
no_traffic.comment: Both platform and challenge need to be set up to enable capture

content.no_challenge: Ouch! No challenges available for this game.
content.scoreboard_tip: Tip: Scroll through the list of challenges with left and right arrow!
content.game_lasts_long: The game will last for a long time
content.scoreboard_note: Note: teams with same score are ranked by submission time.

notification.no_team: Please select the team to participate with
notification.select_chal_and_part: Please select challenges and teams first

pending.title: You have successfully registered as a member of team {{team}}

rejected.title: Your participating request was rejected
rejected.content: Please make sure you are eligible to register in the game and re-register after you meet the requirements

suspended.title: Your team {{team}} has been suspended
suspended.content: If you have any objections, please contact the administrator to appeal.

not_started.title: Game not yet started
not_started.mobile: Please use desktop site to see the details of the game.
not_started.content: You have successfully registered and passed the review as a member of team {{team}}. Please wait for the game start.

team_required.title: Unable to register at this time
team_required.content: You didn't join any team, please create or join a team on the <1> Team Management </1> page.

event.cheat_detected: Cheat detected in challenge {{chal}}, team {{team}} used {{steam}}'s flag.
